verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> you, then shall the <S%H776>land<s%> keep a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H2168>prune<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> in the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> thereof;

But in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> shall be a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> to the <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> you shall <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2168>prune<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

That which <S%H5599>grows<s%> of its own <S%H5599>accord<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> you shall not <S%H7114>reap,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1219>gather<s%> the <S%H6025>grapes<s%> of your <S%H5139>vine<s%> <S%H5139>undressed:<s%> for it is a <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> to the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H402>meat<s%> for you; for you, and for your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and for your <S%H519>maid,<s%> and for your <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>servant,<s%> and for your <S%H8453>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> with you.
And for your <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and for the <S%H2416>beast<s%> that are in your <S%H776>land,<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof be <S%H398>meat.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> to you, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and the <S%H3117>space<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> shall be to you <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

Then shall you cause the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> of the <S%H8643>jubilee<s%> to <S%H5674>sound<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%> shall you make the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H5674>sound<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H776>land.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> the <S%H2572>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof: it shall be a <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> to you; and you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H272>possession,<s%> and you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H4940>family.<s%>

A <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> shall that <S%H2572>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> be to you: you shall not <S%H2232>sow,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7114>reap<s%> that which <S%H5599>grows<s%> of itself in it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1219>gather<s%> the grapes in it of your <S%H5139>vine<s%> <S%H5139>undressed.<s%>
For it is the <S%H3104>jubilee;<s%> it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to you: you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof out of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
In the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H4465>ought<s%> to your <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7069>buy<s%> ought of your <S%H5997>neighbor's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> you shall not <S%H3238>oppress<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another:<s%>

According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> you shall <S%H7069>buy<s%> of your <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> and according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> he shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> to you:

<S%H6310>According<s%> to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> the <S%H4736>price<s%> thereof, and <S%H6310>according<s%> to the <S%H4591>fewness<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H4591>diminish<s%> the <S%H4736>price<s%> of it: for according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> does he <S%H4376>sell<s%> to you.
You shall not therefore <S%H3238>oppress<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5997>another;<s%> but you shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> for I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Why you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; and you shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
And the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H7648>fill,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>therein<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year?<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> we shall not <S%H2232>sow,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H622>gather<s%> in our <S%H8393>increase:<s%>

Then I will <S%H6680>command<s%> my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> on you in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and it shall <S%H6213>bring<s%> <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H8393>fruit<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> yet of <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8393>fruit<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year;<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> her <S%H8393>fruits<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> in you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H3465>old<s%> store.
The <S%H776>land<s%> shall not be <S%H4376>sold<s%> for <S%H6783>ever:<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%> is mine, for you are <S%H1616>strangers<s%> and <S%H8453>sojourners<s%> with me.
And in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> you shall <S%H5414>grant<s%> a <S%H1353>redemption<s%> for the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> be waxen <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and has <S%H4376>sold<s%> away some of his <S%H272>possession,<s%> and if any of his <S%H7138>kin<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it, then shall he <S%H1350>redeem<s%> that which his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4465>sold.<s%>
And <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it, and <S%H3027>himself<s%> be <S%H5381>able<s%> to <S%H1353>redeem<s%> it;

Then let him <S%H2803>count<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H4465>sale<s%> thereof, and <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H5736>remainder<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> he <S%H4376>sold<s%> it; that he may <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> he be not <S%H4672>able<s%> <S%H1767><s%> to <S%H7725>restore<s%> it to him, then that which is <S%H4465>sold<s%> shall <S%H1961>remain<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that has <S%H7069>bought<s%> it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee:<s%> and in the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> it shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out, and he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> a <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in a <S%H2346>walled<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> then he may <S%H1353>redeem<s%> it <S%H5704>within<s%> a <S%H8552>whole<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after it is <S%H4465>sold;<s%> <S%H5704>within<s%> a <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H3117>year<s%> may he <S%H1353>redeem<s%> it.

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be not <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H5704>within<s%> the <S%H4390>space<s%> of a <S%H8549>full<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> then the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is in the <S%H2346>walled<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H6965>established<s%> for <S%H6783>ever<s%> to him that <S%H7069>bought<s%> it throughout his <S%H1755>generations:<s%> it shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> out in the <S%H3104>jubilee.<s%>

But the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H2691>villages<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about them shall be <S%H2803>counted<s%> as the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H776>country:<s%> they may be <S%H1353>redeemed,<s%> and they shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out in the <S%H3104>jubilee.<s%>

Notwithstanding the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H272>possession,<s%> may the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H1353>redeem<s%> at <S%H5769>any<s%> time.

And <S%H834>if<s%> a man <S%H1350>purchase<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> then the <S%H1004>house<s%> that was <S%H4465>sold,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H272>possession,<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out in the year of <S%H3104>jubilee:<s%> for the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> are their <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
But the <S%H7704>field<s%> of the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of their <S%H5892>cities<s%> may not be <S%H4376>sold;<s%> for it is their <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H272>possession.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> be waxen <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and <S%H4131>fallen<s%> <S%H3027><s%> in <S%H4131>decay<s%> with you; then you shall <S%H2388>relieve<s%> him: yes, though he be a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> or a <S%H8453>sojourner;<s%> that he may <S%H2416>live<s%> with you.
<S%H3947>Take<s%> you <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> of him, or <S%H8635>increase:<s%> but <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> that your <S%H251>brother<s%> may <S%H2416>live<s%> with you.
You shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> him your <S%H3701>money<s%> on <S%H5392>usury,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>lend<s%> him your <S%H400>victuals<s%> for <S%H4768>increase.<s%>

I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and to be your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> that dwells by you be waxen <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and be <S%H4376>sold<s%> to you; you shall not <S%H5647>compel<s%> him to <S%H5656>serve<s%> as a <S%H5656>bondservant:<s%>
But as an <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>servant,<s%> and as a <S%H8453>sojourner,<s%> he shall be with you, and shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> you to the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee.<s%>

And then shall he <S%H3318>depart<s%> from you, both he and his <S%H1121>children<s%> with him, and shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to his own <S%H4940>family,<s%> and to the <S%H272>possession<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall he <S%H7725>return.<s%>

For they are my <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> they shall not be <S%H4376>sold<s%> as <S%H5650>slaves.<s%>
You shall not <S%H7287>rule<s%> over him with <S%H6531>rigor;<s%> but shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Both your <S%H5650>slaves,<s%> and your <S%H519>bondmaids,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have,<s%> shall be of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that are <S%H5439>round<s%> about you; of them shall you <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H5650>slaves<s%> and <S%H519>bondmaids.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H8453>strangers<s%> that do <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> among you, of them shall you <S%H7069>buy,<s%> and of their <S%H4940>families<s%> that are with you, which they <S%H3205>begat<s%> in your <S%H776>land:<s%> and they shall be your <S%H272>possession.<s%>

And you shall take them as an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> them for a <S%H272>possession;<s%> they shall be your <S%H5647>slaves<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> but over your <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you shall not <S%H7287>rule<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> over <S%H251>another<s%> with <S%H6531>rigor.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> or <S%H8453>stranger<s%> wax <S%H5381>rich<s%> by you, and your <S%H251>brother<s%> that dwells by him wax <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and <S%H4376>sell<s%> himself to the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> or <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> by you, or to the <S%H6133>stock<s%> of the <S%H1616>stranger's<s%> <S%H4940>family:<s%>
<S%H310>After<s%> that he is <S%H4376>sold<s%> he may be <S%H1353>redeemed<s%> again; <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers<s%> may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> him:

<S%H176>Either<s%> his <S%H1730>uncle,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H1733>uncle's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> him, or any that is <S%H7607>near<s%> of <S%H1320>kin<s%> to him of his <S%H4940>family<s%> may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> him; <S%H176>or<s%> if he be <S%H5381>able,<s%> he may <S%H1353>redeem<s%> <S%H3027>himself.<s%>

And he shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> with him that <S%H7069>bought<s%> him from the <S%H8141>year<s%> that he was <S%H4376>sold<s%> to him to the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee:<s%> and the <S%H3701>price<s%> of his <S%H4465>sale<s%> shall be according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years,<s%> according to the time of an <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>servant<s%> shall it be with him.

<S%H518>If<s%> there be <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> behind, <S%H6310>according<s%> to them he shall <S%H7725>give<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the price of his <S%H1353>redemption<s%> out of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that he was <S%H4736>bought<s%> for.

And <S%H518>if<s%> there <S%H7604>remain<s%> but <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> to the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> then he shall <S%H2803>count<s%> with him, and <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H8141>years<s%> shall he <S%H7725>give<s%> him <S%H7725>again<s%> the price of his <S%H1353>redemption.<s%>
And as a <S%H8141>yearly<s%> <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>servant<s%> shall he be with him: and the other shall not <S%H7287>rule<s%> with <S%H6531>rigor<s%> over him in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he be not <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> in <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> then he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out in the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> both he, and his <S%H1121>children<s%> with him.

For to me the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H5650>servants;<s%> they are my <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H853><s%> I <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
